name: NFT'S Web 3.0 Platform
description:
NFT'S Web 3.0 Platform

NFT Marketplace Website UI Kit is a high-quality web UI designed for the NFT marketplace website. This UI kit is included 23+ screens. Every screen layout is designed to be simple, elegant, and modern. We have designed the app in light mode as well as a dark mode as well. All layers are well-organized to accelerate your design process.

Template Features:

-Modern and Clean Design

-Purposeful Pages

-Symbol Objects

-Compatible with Figma

-Unique and Creative Design

-Easily Customizable files

-Pixel Perfect

-SVG Vector icons

-Well Organized & Grouped Layers

-Graphics Files Included

-Figma File

-Snapshot Folder

-Well Structured Documentation

Add or Replace Images: Select the Group Layer of a section of the Template, then double click on the single-layer where you can put an image; now on

On the right you can see a menu with a lot of options for customization, just click choose image and done!
